title: Fake Subpage (or Section) for Conditions in an Ontology Subsection (or Profile)

fields.message: General Information for a Fake Subpage (or Section) for Conditions

fields.label: General Title of a Fake Subpage (or Section) for Conditions
fields.name: conditions_fpage_title_general
fields.instructions:
If you leave this blank, the default title structure will be used

This value may be overridden by inputs specific to the text element's placement (e.g., title of a fake subpage (or section) for conditions in an area of expertise subsection [or profile]).

fields.label: General Intro Text of a Fake Subpage (or Section) for Conditions
fields.name: conditions_fpage_intro_general
fields.instructions:
If you leave this blank, the default intro text structure will be used

This value may be overridden by inputs specific to the text element's placement (e.g., intro text of a fake subpage (or section) for conditions in an area of expertise subsection [or profile]).
fields.placeholder: UAMS Health [providers] care for a broad range of [conditions], some of which may not be listed below.
